name: Sarah Chalke
info:

  • 别名: Sarah Chalke
  • 别名: サラ・チョーク
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1976-08-27
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
  • 出生地: 加拿大·安大略省·渥太华
  • 配偶: Jamie Afifi
  • Twitter: @sarahchalke
detail: Sarah Chalke (/ˈtʃɔːk/; born August 27, 1976) is a Canadian actress. She is known for portraying Dr. Elliot Reid on the NBC/ABC comedy series Scrubs, the second Rebecca "Becky" Conner on the ABC sitcom Roseanne, Stella Zinman on the CBS sitcom How I Met Your Mother, and Beth Smith on Adult Swim's adult animated science fiction series Rick and Morty. She also had a recurring role on the third season of the ABC/TBS sitcom Cougar Town.
